#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

Koko dobaviti ScriptDev2 ovisno o verziji mangosa

= Details =

Prvo naparavimo poseban folder.
{{{
mkdir src/bindings/ScriptDev2
}}}

Korišteći svn skinemo zadnju verziju ScriptDev2

{{{
svn co https://scriptdev2.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/scriptdev2/src/bindings/ScriptDev2
}}}

Sada moramo patchirati ScriptDev2 U mangos. To nam omogučuje kompajliranje ScriptDev2-a sa mangosom.
{{{
git apply src/bindings/ScriptDev2/patches/MaNGOS-11403-ScriptDev2.patch
}}}
